short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merch X Factor is an advanced listing management tool, bulk price editing and listing editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listing management and bulk repricing tool for Merch by Amazon sellers.
- Quick and easy product filtering
- Bulk listing updates
- Bulk pricing updates
- Bulk pricing automation 
- Rules based price automaion

Implement advanced pricing strategies that will blow your competition away!
